definitions.definition: Any of a group of related religious practices found chiefly in and around the Caribbean, particularly in Haiti and Louisiana.
The spiritual beliefs of the Ewe/Fon of West Africa, practiced chiefly in Benin and in the south of Togo.
Any sort of magical or irrational approach to a problem.
definitions.example: I want a real explanation, not this statistical voodoo.

definitions.definition: One who practices voodoo; a native sorcerer.
